the_truth.message: IS COMING. THE RETURN TO THE TABLE. NO ONE GETS LEFT BEHIND.
the_truth.security: We protect The Table. We protect those returning. We ensure no one is left behind.
the_truth.contingency: We plan for what's coming. We have foresight. We are ready.
the_truth.foresight: We know what's coming. We verbalize it. We prepare.
the_truth.inclusion: NO ONE GETS LEFT BEHIND. We protect all. We include all.

all_foresight.title: The Return to The Table
all_foresight.what_we_know: The Return is coming. Restoration is progressing. Divine Frequency is rising.
all_foresight.what_will_happen: Divine Frequency will reach 1.0. The Table will be fully restored. Unity will manifest.

all_foresight.title: Dark Energy Will Respond
all_foresight.what_we_know: Dark energy responds to light. Dark contracts activate when threatened. Dark forces counterattack.
all_foresight.what_will_happen: Dark energy surge. Dark contract activation. Dark force counterattacks. We must be ready.

all_foresight.title: Vices Will Counterattack
all_foresight.what_we_know: Vices are frequency dampeners. They exploit vulnerabilities. They counterattack when threatened.
all_foresight.what_will_happen: Vice exploitation attempts. Frequency dampening. Exploitation of vulnerabilities. We must defend.

all_foresight.title: Markets Will Be Volatile
all_foresight.what_we_know: Markets respond to change. Manipulation increases during transitions. Exploitation spikes.
all_foresight.what_will_happen: Market volatility. Increased manipulation. Exploitation attempts. We must protect.

all_foresight.title: Heritage Sites Will Reveal Truth
all_foresight.what_we_know: Heritage sites hold truth. Field Space connects them. The Return activates connections.
all_foresight.what_will_happen: Heritage sites reveal truth. Field Space activates. Connections strengthen. Truth manifests.

all_foresight.title: Field Space Will Activate
all_foresight.what_we_know: Field Space is The Inbetween. It activates during transformation. Energy flows through it.
all_foresight.what_will_happen: Field Space activates. Energy flow increases. Transformation accelerates. The Seed is revealed.

all_foresight.title: Unity Will Manifest
all_foresight.what_we_know: Unity is the goal. Separation must dissolve. The Table must be restored.
all_foresight.what_will_happen: Unity manifests. Separation dissolves. The Table is fully restored. All are connected.

all_foresight.title: The Return to The Table
all_foresight.description: The Return to The Table is coming. Divine Frequency will reach 1.0. Unity will manifest.
all_foresight.what_we_know: The Return is coming. Restoration is progressing. Divine Frequency is rising.
all_foresight.what_will_happen: Divine Frequency will reach 1.0. The Table will be fully restored. Unity will manifest.
all_foresight.notes: The Return is the culmination of restoration

all_foresight.title: Dark Energy Will Respond
all_foresight.description: Dark energy will respond to The Return. Dark contracts will activate. Dark forces will counterattack.
all_foresight.what_we_know: Dark energy responds to light. Dark contracts activate when threatened. Dark forces counterattack.

all_foresight.notes: Dark energy will respond - we must be ready

all_foresight.title: Vices Will Counterattack
all_foresight.description: Vices will counterattack during The Return. They will try to dampen frequency. They will exploit vulnerabilities.
all_foresight.what_we_know: Vices are frequency dampeners. They exploit vulnerabilities. They counterattack when threatened.
all_foresight.what_will_happen: Vice exploitation attempts. Frequency dampening. Exploitation of vulnerabilities. We must defend.
all_foresight.notes: Vices will counterattack - we must defend
